about_the_game:
Welcome to Galactic Vanguard - A Universe Awaits!

In Galactic Vanguard, embark on an epic adventure across a galaxy filled with mystery and conflict. As a brave space explorer, your choices will shape the fate of planets and civilizations. Discover uncharted worlds, engage in strategic battles, and forge your path in this handcrafted universe.

Key Features:

🚀 Expansive Galaxy Exploration:

Travel to diverse planets, each with unique landscapes and mysteries.

🌌 Dynamic Space Combat:

Engage in tactical space battles with customizable ships.

👽 Rich Alien Cultures:

Interact with various alien species, each with their own history and technology.

💰 Robust Trading System:

Master the art of interstellar trade to build your wealth and influence.

🤝 Massive Multiplayer:

Team up with friends to explore and conquer together.

Play Galactic Vanguard Today:

Are you ready to carve your destiny among the stars? Your journey into the cosmic abyss begins now.

name: Galactic Vanguard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and 11
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements do not represent the current requirements of the game and may change before release
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements do not represent the current requirements of the game and may change before release
